channel.title: [php] regex + functions [solved!]
channel.description:
I am making a website for somebody, however, I have hit a wall. I need to use a function inside of BBcode(to edit their site, they are in no way computer literate, so I am making things as simple as it can get) to get info from the database, and return the code for the table(as in html table) as (1 => '/\[box\](.+?)\[\/box\]/s'); preg_replace-ing to (1 => ''.getbundle($1).''); gives an error. Does anyone know how to make a bbcode script that can use functions like this? the function is fine(it returns what it should, but doesn't like me.. with the bbcode) and works perfectly, but doesn't like how it is just a $1 as a variable.. when it works perfectly in for example 12 => '/\[sup\](.+?)\[\/sup\]/s', 12 => '<sup>$1</sup>',
any help would be appreciated! because this needs to be working in order for the thing to be almost complete. Thank you for your attempts and just considering my question. I have been unable to find anything like this yet on google unless you can prove me wrong, PLEASE do so. I seriously need this to work. :D
